c74object.name: abc.mc.delay~
c74object.description:
abc.mc.delay~ provides multiple parallel delay lines with reinjection. Each line is a double overlapped delay enabling duration changes without clicking at a maximum speed set by updatefreq parameter which is initialized at 30 Hz (30 Hz means one can change the duration of the delay up to 30 times per second).
The other important feature of these delays lines is that all durations are given not in milliseconds but as a musical durations: 1 stands for a quarter, 0.5 for an 8th, 0.25 for a 16th, etc. Durations are parameters dur0, dur1, dur2, etc.
These musical durations are automatically converted to milliseconds thanks to the tempo parameter expressed in bpm.
Each delay line has got an individual feedback: fdbk0, fdbk1, fdbk2, etc. (between 0 and 1)
Each delay line has got an individual gain: gain0, gain1, gain2, etc. in dB (between -127 and +18)

attribute.name: dur[index]
attribute.description: sets the duration of the delay line [index], [index] is an integer corresponding to the number of the process from 0, if value inferior to 10 index should be written "6" for example. These delays lines are given not in milliseconds but as a musical durations: 1 stands for a quarter, 0.5 for an 8th, 0.25 for a 16th, etc. Durations are parameters dur0, dur1, dur2, etc. These musical durations are automatically converted to milliseconds thanks to the tempo parameter expressed in bpm. [init=0:min=0:max=32:step=0.0001]
attribute.digest: sets the duration of the delay line [index] in musical duration

attribute.name: gain[index]
attribute.description: sets the gain of the [index] delay line in dB, [index] is an integer corresponding to the number of the process from 0, if value inferior to 10 index should be written "6" for example. [init=0:min=-127:max=18:step=0.001].
attribute.digest: sets the gain of the [index] delay line in dB

attribute.name: fdbk[index]
attribute.description: sets the feedback level of the [index] delay line, [index] is an integer corresponding to the number of the process from 0, if value inferior to 10 index should be written "6" for example. [init=0:min=0:max=0.99999:step=0.0001]
attribute.digest: sets the feedback level of the [index] delay line

attribute.name: tempo
attribute.description: sets the reference tempo in bpm to calculate the delay lines durations [init=60:min=1:max=600:step=0.01]
attribute.digest: sets the reference tempo in bpm to calculate the delay lines durations

attribute.name: updatefreq
attribute.description: sets the frequency of the interpolation between the delay lines which are overlapped. [init=30:min=0.0001:max=1000:step=0.0001]
attribute.digest: sets the reference tempo in bpm to calculate the delay lines durations
